TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi NativeWindow extends System.MarshalByRefObject implements class System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window
Public Class NativeWindow Inherits MarshalByRefObject Implements IWin32Window
public ref class NativeWindow : MarshalByRefObject, System::Windows::Forms::IWin32Window
type NativeWindow = class inherit MarshalByRefObject interface IWin32Window

summary.span: 提供窗口句柄和窗口过程的低级封装。

span.span: Provides a low-level encapsulation of a window handle and a window procedure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类自动管理窗口类创建和注册。This class automatically manages window class creation and registration. 与窗口句柄相关联时，窗口未进行垃圾回收。A window is not eligible for garbage collection when it is associated with a window handle. 若要确保正确执行垃圾回收，句柄必须要么销毁使用手动或释放使用。To ensure proper garbage collection, handles must either be destroyed manually using or released using . > [!NOTE] > WM_NCDESTROY 消息处理时调用方法。The method is called when the WM_NCDESTROY message is processed. 这意味着，某些情况下，在此操作时不需要手动调用，但它是很好的做法执行此操作。This means there are cases in which when you do not need to manually call , but it is good practice to do so. 类提供了下列属性和方法，用于管理句柄： ， ， ， ，并。The class provides the following properties and methods to manage handles: , , , , and . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示在窗口过程，并具有特定操作系统窗口类名称创建一个窗口截获操作系统窗口消息。The following code example demonstrates intercepting operating system window messages in a window procedure, and creating a window with a specific operating system window class name. 该示例创建两个继承的类，实现此目的。The example creates two classes that inherit from that accomplish this. `MyNativeWindowListener`类传递到构造函数，该窗体的窗口过程挂钩，并重写方法以截获`WM_ACTIVATEAPP`窗口消息。The `MyNativeWindowListener` class hooks into the window procedure of the form passed into the constructor, and overrides the method to intercept the `WM_ACTIVATEAPP` window message. 类演示的使用情况并方法来标识的窗口句柄将使用。The class demonstrates the usage of the and methods to identify the window handle the will use. 该句柄已分配基于和事件。The handle is assign based upon the and events. 当`WM_ACTIVATEAPP`接收窗口消息，则类调用`form1.ApplicationActivated`方法。When the `WM_ACTIVATEAPP` window message is received, the class calls the `form1.ApplicationActivated` method. `MyNativeWindow`类创建一个具有新窗口设置为`BUTTON`。The `MyNativeWindow` class creates a new window with the set to `BUTTON`. 类演示了如何使用方法和重写方法来接收的截距窗口消息。The class demonstrates using the method and overriding the method to intercept window messages that are received. [!code-cpp[NativeWindow#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[NativeWindow#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[NativeWindow#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/VB/form1.vb#1)]

permission.span: 直接调用方调用非托管的代码。

span.span: for the immediate caller to call unmanaged code.
Associated enumeration:

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

span.span: Initializes an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这是默认的由编译器提供的构造函数。This is the default constructor provided by the compiler. 类还具有静态构造函数初始化应用程序的全域性消息处理程序和哈希表。The class also has a static constructor that initializes application domain-wide message handlers and hash tables.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AssignHandle(native int handle) cil managed

span.span: The handle to assign to this window.
Assigns a handle to this window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 截获窗口消息发送到`handle`参数。 intercepts window messages sent to the `handle` parameter. 使用重置为默认窗口过程的句柄的窗口过程。Use to reset the handle's window procedure to the default window procedure. 方法调用方法，以指明的值属性已更改。The method calls the method to indicate that the value of the property has changed. > [!NOTE] > 要分配的句柄不能在不同的应用程序的进程中。The handle to assign cannot be in a different application process. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示在窗口过程中的截获操作系统窗口消息。The following code example demonstrates intercepting operating system window messages in a window procedure. 该示例创建一个类继承自来实现此目的。The example creates a class that inherits from to accomplish this. `MyNativeWindowListener`类传递到构造函数，该窗体的窗口过程挂钩，并重写方法来截获`WM_ACTIVATEAPP`窗口消息。The `MyNativeWindowListener` class hooks into the window procedure of the form passed into the constructor, and overrides the method to intercepts the `WM_ACTIVATEAPP` window message. 类演示如何使用并方法来标识在哪个窗口处理将使用。The class demonstrates the use of the and methods to identify which window handle the will use. 根据分配句柄和事件。The handle is assigned based upon the and events. 当`WM_ACTIVATEAPP`接收窗口消息，则类调用`form1.ApplicationActivated`方法。When the `WM_ACTIVATEAPP` window message is received, the class calls the `form1.ApplicationActivated` method. 此代码是一段摘录所示示例类概述。This code is an excerpt from the example shown in the class overview. 为了简洁起见，不显示一些代码。Some code is not shown for the purpose of brevity. 请参阅有关整个代码列表。See for the whole code listing. [!code-cpp[NativeWindow#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[NativeWindow#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[NativeWindow#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/VB/form1.vb#2)]

exception.span: 此窗口已经具有一个句柄。

span.span: This window already has a handle.

exception.span: 未能检索关联的本机窗口的窗口过程。

span.span: The windows procedure for the associated native window could not be retrieved.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CreateHandle(class System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams cp) cil managed
Public Overridable Sub CreateHandle (cp As CreateParams)
abstract member CreateHandle : System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams -> unit override this.CreateHandle : System.Windows.Forms.CreateParams -> unit

span.span: A that specifies the creation parameters for this window.

summary.span: 使用指定的创建参数创建一个窗口及其句柄。

span.span: Creates a window and its handle with the specified creation parameters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `cp`参数指定的值传递给本机 Win32`CreateWindowEx`方法来创建一个窗口，其句柄。The `cp` parameter specifies the values that are passed to the native Win32 `CreateWindowEx` method to create a window and its handle. 当字段不是`null`，从指定的类继承的新创建的窗口句柄。When the field is not `null`, the newly created window handle inherits from the specified class. 例如，如果设置为`BUTTON`，新创建的窗口基于 Win32`BUTTON`窗口类。For example, if is set to `BUTTON`, the newly created window is based on the Win32 `BUTTON` window class. 的属性对象必须是`null`或引用声明为结构类的实例。The property of the object must either be `null` or reference an instance of a class that was declared as a structure. 此代码是一段摘录所示示例类概述。This code is an excerpt from the example shown in the class overview. 为了简洁起见，不显示一些代码。Some code is not shown for the purpose of brevity. 请参阅有关整个代码列表。See for the whole code listing. > [!NOTE] > 提供的类名称已注册到操作系统。The class name provided is registered with the operating system. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用特定操作系统窗口类名称创建一个窗口。The following code example demonstrates creating a window with a specific operating system window class name. 该示例创建一个类继承自来实现此目的。The example creates a class that inherits from to accomplish this. `MyNativeWindow`类创建一个具有新窗口设置为`BUTTON`。The `MyNativeWindow` class creates a new window with the set to `BUTTON`. 这将创建一个 Win32 按钮窗口。This creates a Win32 button window. 位置和大小的按钮的设置，以及指定其他窗口样式。The location and size of the button is set, along with specifying additional window styles. 类演示如何使用方法，并替代方法来接收的截距窗口消息。The class demonstrates how to use the method and override the method to intercept window messages that are received. 尽管该示例将查找 WM_ACTIVATEAPP 消息，这可以替换为实际程序中特定于创建的类型的窗口消息。Although the example looks for the WM_ACTIVATEAPP message, this can be replaced in a real program with window messages specific to the type created. > [!NOTE] > 某些控件类型将其窗口消息发送到而不是窗口的窗口父级。Some control types send their window messages to the window parent instead of the window. 请参阅 Windows Platform SDK 的详细信息。See the Windows Platform SDK for more information. [!code-cpp[NativeWindow#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NativeWindow#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[NativeWindow#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/VB/form1.vb#3)]

exception.span: 尝试创建本机窗口时操作系统资源不足。

span.span: The operating system ran out of resources when trying to create the native window.

exception.span: 本机 Win32 API 未能创建指定窗口。

span.span: The native Win32 API could not create the specified window.

exception.span: 当前本机窗口的句柄已赋值；即 属性不等于 。

span.span: The handle of the current native window is already assigned; in explanation, the property is not equal to .

permission.span: 若要创建一个顶级窗口。

span.span: to create a top-level window.

permission.span: 如果窗口样式不是子级或窗口不具有父级时才需要此权限。

span.span: This permission is only demanded if the window style is not a child or if the window does not have a parent.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DefWndProc(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Message& m) cil managed
Public Sub DefWndProc (ByRef m As Message)

span.span: The message that is currently being processed.

summary.span: 调用与此窗口关联的默认窗口过程。

span.span: Invokes the default window procedure associated with this window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，只能调用方法时您截获窗口消息，并且想要以处理消息的默认窗口过程。Typically, you only call the method when you are intercepting window messages and would like the default window procedure to handle the message. 不应调用将窗口消息发送到窗口;调用 Win32`SendMessage`函数。 should not be called to send a window message to the window; call the Win32 `SendMessage` function instead. 它是调用错误时属性为 0。It is an error to call when the property is 0.

span.para: 重写此方法在派生类来实现通用的自定义消息处理特定的本机窗口或.NET Windows 窗体中。之前、 之后还是而不是调用此方法，后者将执行标准的消息处理的基类实现，可以执行自定义处理。与此相反，添加将自定义消息处理的应用程序可通过以下方式方法的类。

Override this method in a derived class to implement generalized custom message handling for a specific native window or .NET Windows Forms . Custom processing can be performed before, after, or instead of a call to the base class implementation of this method, which performs standard message processing. In contrast, adding customized message handling for an application can be accomplished through the method of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void DestroyHandle() cil managed
abstract member DestroyHandle : unit -> unit override this.DestroyHandle : unit -> unit

span.span: Destroys the window and its handle.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会破坏与关联的窗口，设置属性设置为 0，并调用方法，以反映更改。This method destroys the window associated with the , sets the property to 0, and calls the method to reflect the change. 通常情况下，只能调用完成后使用本机窗口。Typically, you only call when you are done with the native window. > [!NOTE] > 类会自动将销毁关联的窗口并释放其资源以响应 WM_DESTROY 消息。The class automatically will destroy the associated window and release its resources in response to a WM_DESTROY message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 释放与此窗口相关联的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources associated with this window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法移除当前与关联的 Win32 派生类实例，释放句柄，并将 WM_CLOSE 消息发送到关联的窗口。The method removes the Win32 derived class associated with the current instance, releases the handle, and posts a WM_CLOSE message to the associated window.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Windows.Forms.NativeWindow FromHandle(native int handle) cil managed
Public Shared Function FromHandle (handle As IntPtr) As NativeWindow

span.span: A handle to a window.

summary.span: 检索与指定句柄相关联的窗口。

span.span: Retrieves the window associated with the specified handle.
The associated with the specified handle.

returns.span: 当句柄没有关联窗口时，此方法将返回 。

span.span: This method returns when the handle does not have an associated window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您收到来自另一种方法的句柄，则使用此方法来检索与该句柄关联的窗口。If you receive a handle from another method, use this method to retrieve the window associated with the handle. 必须已由另一个拥有句柄在当前进程; 否则为`null`返回。The handle must already be owned by another in the current process; otherwise, `null` is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Handle As IntPtr
public: property IntPtr Handle { IntPtr get(); };

span.span: Gets the handle for this window.

value.span: 如果成功，则为一个 （表示关联的本机 Win32 窗口的句柄）；否则为 0（如果窗口没有任何关联句柄）。

span.span: If successful, an representing the handle to the associated native Win32 window; otherwise, 0 if no handle is associated with the window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 Windows API 要求使用句柄的窗口或控件的方法时，请使用此方法。Use this method when calling Windows API methods that require a handle for a window or control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用特定操作系统窗口类名称创建一个窗口。The following code example demonstrates creating a window with a specific operating system window class name. 该示例创建一个类继承自来实现此目的。The example creates a class that inherits from to accomplish this. 该示例还演示如何重写方法时通知更改。The example also demonstrates overriding the method to be notified when the changes. `MyNativeWindow`类创建一个具有新窗口将设置为按钮。The `MyNativeWindow` class creates a new window with the set to BUTTON. 这将创建一个 Win32 按钮窗口。This creates a Win32 button window. 位置和大小的按钮的设置，以及指定其他窗口样式。The location and size of the button is set, along with specifying additional window styles. 类演示如何使用方法，并替代方法来接收的截距窗口消息。The class demonstrates how to use the method and override the method to intercept window messages that are received. 尽管该示例将查找 WM_ACTIVATEAPP 消息，这可替换为实际程序中特定于创建的类型的窗口消息。Although the example looks for the WM_ACTIVATEAPP message, this could be replaced in a real program with window messages specific to the type created. > [!NOTE] > 某些控件类型将其窗口消息发送到而不是窗口的窗口父级。Some control types send their window messages to the window parent instead of the window. 请参阅 Windows Platform SDK 的详细信息。See the Windows Platform SDK for more information. [!code-cpp[NativeWindow#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NativeWindow#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[NativeWindow#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/VB/form1.vb#3)]

[!code-cpp[NativeWindow#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[NativeWindow#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[NativeWindow#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/NativeWindow/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 释放与此窗口相关联的句柄。

span.span: Releases the handle associated with this window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不会销毁窗口句柄。This method does not destroy the window handle. 相反，它将该句柄的窗口过程设置为默认窗口过程。Instead, it sets the handle's window procedure to the default window procedure. 它会设置属性设置为 0，并调用以反映更改。It sets the property to 0 and calls to reflect the change. 如果收到指示 Windows 已销毁该句柄的本机 Win32 WM_NCDESTROY 消息，窗口会自动调用此方法。A window automatically calls this method if it receives a native Win32 WM_NCDESTROY message, indicating that Windows has destroyed the handle. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示在窗口过程中的截获操作系统窗口消息。The following code example demonstrates intercepting operating system window messages in a window procedure. 该示例创建一个类继承自来实现此目的。The example creates a class that inherits from to accomplish this. `MyNativeWindowListener`类传递到构造函数，该窗体的窗口过程挂钩，并重写方法来截获`WM_ACTIVATEAPP`窗口消息。The `MyNativeWindowListener` class hooks into the window procedure of the form passed into the constructor, and overrides the method to intercepts the `WM_ACTIVATEAPP` window message. 类演示如何使用并方法来标识的窗口句柄将使用。The class demonstrates the use of the and methods to identify the window handle the will use. 该句柄已分配基于和事件。The handle is assign based upon the and events. 当`WM_ACTIVATEAPP`接收窗口消息，则类调用`form1.ApplicationActivated`方法。When the `WM_ACTIVATEAPP` window message is received, the class calls the `form1.ApplicationActivated` method. 此代码是一段摘录所示示例类概述。This code is an excerpt from the example shown in the class overview. 为了简洁起见，不显示一些代码。Some code is not shown for the purpose of brevity. 请参阅有关整个代码列表。See for the whole code listing. remarks.format: ## Remarks 窗口消息发送到窗口的句柄时，调用此方法。This method is called when a window message is sent to the handle of the window. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示在窗口过程中的截获操作系统窗口消息。The following code example demonstrates intercepting operating system window messages in a window procedure. 该示例创建一个类继承自来实现此目的。The example creates a class that inherits from to accomplish this. `MyNativeWindowListener`类传递到构造函数，该窗体的窗口过程挂钩，并重写方法以截获`WM_ACTIVATEAPP`窗口消息。The `MyNativeWindowListener` class hooks into the window procedure of the form passed into the constructor, and overrides the method to intercept the `WM_ACTIVATEAPP` window message. 类演示如何使用并方法来标识的窗口句柄将使用。The class demonstrates the use of the and methods to identify the window handle the will use. 根据分配句柄和事件。The handle is assigned based upon the and events. 当`WM_ACTIVATEAPP`接收窗口消息，则类调用`form1.ApplicationActivated`方法。When the `WM_ACTIVATEAPP` window message is received, the class calls the `form1.ApplicationActivated` method. 此代码是一段摘录所示示例类概述。This code is an excerpt from the example shown in the class overview. 为了简洁起见，不显示一些代码。Some code is not shown for the purpose of brevity. 请参阅有关整个代码列表。See for the whole code listing. span.para: 重写此方法以实现特定的消息处理。调用基。WndProc的未处理的消息。
Override this method to implement specific message processing. Call base.WndProc for unhandled messages.
